name: Free Bird
description:
made by: Christian Eugenio Indie Games

Help the birds save the legendary powerful birds that are trapped on a cage.

how to play:

just click to fly and dodge obstacles, hit eggs that you find on your way.

Each bird has its own strengths and weaknesses,find the one that suits you!.

* blue bird - balanced

* red bird - slow but unpredictable

* green bird - very fast

* purple bird - wants to fly away

* dark blue bird - changes its size

get hidden keys that are inside the eggs to unlock the...

* secret dark bird - destroys obstacles with his power.

* secret white bird - uses random invisibility to avoid obstacles.

beat your best score and enjoy!
